description:
Purchase the silicone I used on my Amazon Storefront 👉🏼https://amzn.to/40Akntv
In this video, I’ll show you step-by-step how to re-caulk your bathtub for a clean finish that actually lasts. Using GE Supreme Kitchen & Bath Silicone Sealant, I’ll walk you through the entire process - from removing old caulk without scratching your bathtub to applying a smooth, waterproof seal. 

This video has been sponsored by GE
#GESealantsPartner

title: Most People Are Re-Caulking Their Bathtub Wrong (Here’s The Right Way)
